landing.title: Secret Santa
landing.subtitle: Organize your gift exchange with ease
instructions: Create a new Secret Santa with participant names
Set a random seed for reproducible assignments
Share individual links with each participant
Each person sees only who they're giving to
Admin can view all assignments with password
landing.securityNoticeText: This app works on the honor system! Links are encoded (not encrypted), so it's best for trustworthy groups like family, friends, or coworkers. If you need Fort Knox security, this might not be your app! üòä

create.title: Create Secret Santa
create.participantsHelp: Enter one name per line (minimum 3, maximum 50 participants)
create.seedHelp: A random seed has been generated, or you can provide your own
create.passwordHelp: Optional - leave blank for no password protection
